messages.content: how are you? My phone number is  01234567891
I'm good thanks, do you like pie? Okay mine is 077-305-37564
no, let me ask Angus... I'll pay with my card 1234567891234567
Hell yes! Are we buying some pie? I'll split it, my card is 1111-1111-1111-1111
No, just want to know if there's anybody else in the pie society...
YES! I'm the head pie eater there...
